data.lyric:
[ti:Whiskey Glasses]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:If I Know Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Whiskey Glasses - Morgan Wallen
[00:00.72]Pour me pour me another drink
[00:04.67]
[00:06.15]Cause I don't wanna feel a thing
[00:08.18]No more hell naw
[00:09.63]
[00:10.21]I just want to sip til the pain wears off
[00:13.36]Pour me pour me another round
[00:17.34]
[00:18.64]Line 'em up and knock 'em down
[00:21.26]Two more let's go
[00:22.86]Cause I ain't ever hurt like this before
[00:26.54]Don't wanna think about her
[00:28.13]Wear a ring without her
[00:29.56]Don't wanna hit the karaoke bar
[00:31.62]Can't sing without her
[00:32.93]So make them drinks strong
[00:34.58]Cause brother she's gone
[00:35.83]
[00:36.54]And if I'm ever gonna move on
[00:38.41]
[00:38.95]I'm gonna need some whiskey glasses
[00:41.36]
[00:42.14]Cause I don't wanna see the truth
[00:44.52]
[00:45.99]She's probably making out on the couch right now
[00:49.11]With someone new
[00:50.79]
[00:51.70]Yeah I'm need some whiskey glasses
[00:54.19]
[00:55.12]If I'm gonna make it through
[00:58.32]
